{{disambig-more|Haleth|[[Haleth (disambiguation)]]}} {{infobox character | people=[[Rohirrim|Rohir]] | name=Haleth | image=Lída Holubová - The House of Eorl - Children of Helm Hammerhand.jpg | caption="The House of Eorl - Children of Helm Hammerhand" by [[Lída Holubová]] | pronun= | othernames= | titles= | position= | location=[[Rohan]] | affiliation= | language=[[Rohanese]] and [[Westron]] | birth= | birthlocation= | rule= | death={{TA|2758}} | deathlocation=[[Meduseld]], [[Edoras]] | age= | notablefor= | house=[[House of Eorl]] | parentage=[[Helm|Helm Hammerhand]] | siblings=[[Háma (son of Helm)|Háma]] and [[Helm's daughter|unnamed sister]] | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} '''Haleth''' was the oldest child of [[Helm|Helm Hammerhand]] and brother of [[Háma (son of Helm)|Háma]]. ==History== Haleth tried to defend [[Edoras]] from the [[Dunlendings]] who had invaded in {{TA|2758}}, but he was killed at the doors of [[Meduseld]], the last of its defenders. [[Wulf]] son of [[Freca]] usurped the throne while Helm and Háma fled to [[Helm's Deep]].{{App|Eorl}} ==Etymology== ''Haleth'' means "man", "warrior" or "hero" in poetry in [[Old English]].{{HM|RC}}, p. 704{{webcite|website=[http://www.bosworthtoller.com/ Bosworth-Toller Anglo-Saxon Dictionary]|articleurl=https://bosworthtoller.com/17892|articlename=hæleþ|accessed=24 July 2025}} Not to be confused with [[Mannish]] [[Haleth]]. ==Genealogy== {{familytree/start}} {{familytree | | | | | | | | | | | GRA | | |GRA=[[Gram]]
